mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vendorInfo ( vendorName, businessRegNum, contractStartDt, contractEndDt, state, regMemberId, regDt ) VALUES ( #{vendorName}, #{businessRegNum}, #{contractStartDt}, #{contractEndDt}, #{state}, #{regMemberId}, #{regDt} )
mapper.select:
select vi.id, vi.vendorName, vi.businessRegNum, DATE_FORMAT(vi.contractStartDt,'%Y-%m-%d') contractStartDt, DATE_FORMAT(vi.contractEndDt,'%Y-%m-%d') contractEndDt, vi.state, vi.regMemberId, DATE_FORMAT(vi.regDt,'%Y/%m/%d %h:%m:%s') regDt, m.name from vendorInfo vi inner join `member` m on vi.regMemberId = m.id
WHERE vi.state = #{state}
